translation: Wow! This city's really fancy, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wow! This city's really fancy, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Look at all these buildings!{LF}They're tall! Really tall!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Look at all these buildings!{LF}They're tall! Really tall!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Maybe so, but the city's still dead.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe so, but the city's still dead.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And soon it'll be drenched in blood once more.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And soon it'll be drenched in blood once more.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Zero?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: How are things proceeding up there?{#Name="Octa"}
source: How are things proceeding up there?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You mean besides the million and{LF}one assholes trying to kill us?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You mean besides the million and{LF}one assholes trying to kill us?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ah, yes. We feel much the same{LF}down here on the ground.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ah, yes. We feel much the same{LF}down here on the ground.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: This is Lady One's personal guard.{#Name="Octa"}
source: This is Lady One's personal guard.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: The fiercer they attack, the closer{LF}we must be to our goal.{#Name="Octa"}
source: The fiercer they attack, the closer{LF}we must be to our goal.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Good to know.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Good to know.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: One! Get over here! Let's settle this!{#Name="Zero"}
source: One! Get over here! Let's settle this!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Settle down. Such shouting doesn't become you,{LF}Sister. I can hear you fine.{#Name="One"}
source: Settle down. Such shouting doesn't become you,{LF}Sister. I can hear you fine.{#Name="One"}

translation: You transformed your dragon into a daemon.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You transformed your dragon into a daemon.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Where's the disciple you used{LF}to summon that thing?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Where's the disciple you used{LF}to summon that thing?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...I have no disciple.{#Name="One"}
source: ...I have no disciple.{#Name="One"}

translation: What?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Disciples are little more than tragic,{LF}pitiful tools.{#Name="One"}
source: Disciples are little more than tragic,{LF}pitiful tools.{#Name="One"}

translation: I have no need for such things.{#Name="One"}
source: I have no need for such things.{#Name="One"}

translation: Heh. Same old One with her same old bullshit.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. Same old One with her same old bullshit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Controlling a dragon without a disciple?{LF}What kind of trick is that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Controlling a dragon without a disciple?{LF}What kind of trick is that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey! It takes more than a trick{LF}to control a dragon!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey! It takes more than a trick{LF}to control a dragon!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I bet One and her dragon are really close, too!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I bet One and her dragon are really close, too!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Kinda like you and me, right, Zero?{LF}Best friends forever!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Kinda like you and me, right, Zero?{LF}Best friends forever!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Heh. What they're bound by isn't friendship.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. What they're bound by isn't friendship.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nice.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nice.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Where the hell is One?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Where the hell is One?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That way! She took off into that flock of wyverns!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That way! She took off into that flock of wyverns!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Stupid wyverns! Buncha low-class,{LF}job-stealin' bastards!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Stupid wyverns! Buncha low-class,{LF}job-stealin' bastards!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Lemme at 'em! I'll kill 'em all!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Lemme at 'em! I'll kill 'em all!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: This wyvern thing of yours is really weird.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This wyvern thing of yours is really weird.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ha ha ha ha! How's it goin' up there, Z?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha ha! How's it goin' up there, Z?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Buncha wyverns trying to kill me. How 'bout you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Buncha wyverns trying to kill me. How 'bout you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Fantastic, thanks! There's blood EVERYWHERE!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Fantastic, thanks! There's blood EVERYWHERE!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It's even in my EYES! HA HA HA HA HA!{#Name="Dito"}
source: It's even in my EYES! HA HA HA HA HA!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Er... You know what? Good for you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Er... You know what? Good for you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! We're almost at the heart of the city!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! We're almost at the heart of the city!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Right. We'd better go by foot from here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Right. We'd better go by foot from here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Kill One.{#Name="目的文"}
source: Kill One.{#Name="目的文"}

translation: Defeat Gabriel!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat Gabriel!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: LD02:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}
source: LD02:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}

translation: 目標達成　LD00:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}
source: 目標達成　LD00:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}

translation: 目標達成　LD01:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}
source: 目標達成　LD01:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}

translation: 目標達成　LD02:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}
source: 目標達成　LD02:ダミー{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Zero! My fireballs don't seem to be hurting him!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! My fireballs don't seem to be hurting him!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: His skin's too tough. We're gonna{LF}have to hit his weak point.{#Name="Zero"}
source: His skin's too tough. We're gonna{LF}have to hit his weak point.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey! We're comin' up on a dead-end!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey! We're comin' up on a dead-end!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's no good! We can't get away! We can't get away!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's no good! We can't get away! We can't get away!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: To conquer the enemy stronghold in the Cathedral City,{#Name="Accord"}
source: To conquer the enemy stronghold in the Cathedral City,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Zero's group decided to stage an attack from the air.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Zero's group decided to stage an attack from the air.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But what they found waiting for them there...{#Name="Accord"}
source: But what they found waiting for them there...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: was none other than One herself. The final Intoner.{#Name="Accord"}
source: was none other than One herself. The final Intoner.{#Name="Accord"}
